title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2017 (S.I. No. 575 of 2017)
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Valuation Act 2001 (Prescribed
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Valuation Act 2001 (Prescribed 

Means for Certificates, Notices and Other) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited valuation act 2001 (prescribed mean certificate notice other) regulation 2021

title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2017 (S.I. No. 575 of 2017)
heading: 2. Under Section 66 a certificate, notice or other document under this Act
text_raw:
2. Under Section 66 a certificate, notice or other document under this Act 
may be issued to, given to or, as the case may be, served on the person in an 
electronic form, whether as an electronic communication or otherwise.
text_norm: 2 section 66 certificate notice document act may issued given case may served person electronic form whether electronic communication otherwise

title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2017 (S.I. No. 575 of 2017)
heading: In these regulations “electronic communication” means information
text_raw:
3. 

In these regulations “electronic communication” means information 
communicated or intended to be communicated to a person, other than its 
originator, that is generated, communicated, processed, sent, received, 
recorded, stored or displayed by electronic means or in electronic form. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 May, 2021. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st May, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [247] 3
